name: Quest of Magic: Millenus's Greed
description:
What will it be like? To be a treasure hunter in a dungeon. A dungeon that is said to have gold coins worth a billion dollars. Whoever can own it, you will not have to work anymore 

for entire life. Once you entered the dungeon, the entrance shut itself. You have no other choice. You have to go forward, fighting monsters, finding chest and avoiding 

-Have a feel of original gamebook style

-Fighting face to face with monsters using Skill cards

-Exciting events that will keep thrilled

How to PLAY

-Use mouse cursor to click the button

-Esc for exit, F4 to switch fullscreen mode

Hi, I am Arkman from Thailand. This is my first English game, I hope you will enjoy it.
